---
category: news
title: "DCU launches new MSc in Natural Language Processing"
excerpt: "DCU has launched a new MSc in Natural Language Processing (NLP), the first master's degree of its kind in Ireland. Developed by world-class academics, and led by Professor Anya Belz, Professor of NLP, this full-time master's degree will be delivered on-campus by the School of Computing in DCU's Faculty of Engineering and Computing."
